name: StyleStanza Pvt. Ltd.
tag_list: fashion, style, networking, fashion-news, celebrity-styling, movies-inspired-styling, brands, fashion-houses, trends, seasons-reports, trend-reports, style-boards, mood-boards, style-chapters
description: style guide, fashion news and networkin
overview:
StyleStanza.com is a style guide, fashion news and networking website. The website’s primary focus is not only to update the visitors but encourage them to create their own styling. StyleStanza covers fashion news and updates, brands, products, styling tips, celebrity styling, fashion weeks, seasonal and trends reports, movie inspired styling, style boards and beauty tips. The sign up process is easy and free. The members will have their profile page having their picture, information and their favorite fashion quotes. A member can chose to keep his profile public or private. The most unique feature is the style chapter which enables the users to create their own style chapters with the pictures and articles of their choice. It can be shared on all major social networks. In addition, StyleStanza will provide expert advices to its members. This young start-up is having more than 20 experts on board, including fashion designers, stylists, writers, bloggers, analysts and consultants. StyleStanza is all set to launchin September second week. Its final testing is in the last stage and facebook page is already active and busy with subscribers.

Startup Novelty: style Chapter (feature allowing users can create their own scrap book with the pictures and posts they like on this website), Style Boards (designed by experts to inspire users to create their own exclusive style), Sponsors Page (all the ads featured on the website will be listed where users will be allowed to ask questions and our experts will answer, like how and where to buy)
